name: Pogumono Prototype
description:
Pogumono is a 2D strategy game where you raise your pogumonos and then fight the enemy pogumonos. The game was made in a week for my Game Production II class, so it's a bit wonky.

Instructions/Controls:

Raise up your Pogumonos, once you feel ready take them into battle. The team with pogumonos left wins.

  • Choose five eggs at the start by clicking on them
  • Click on the happy face, then the Pogumono to give experience
  • Click on the sad face, then the Pogumono to make it loose experience
  • (This mechanic is a bit wonky so it may take multiple clicks back and fourth)
  • Click on the sword when you're ready to go into battle
